messages.title: A stronger voice for our local area.
messages.content: As your local MSP, Gordon will continue to speak up for everyone in Edinburgh Pentlands.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Gordon understands the importance of a strong local economy. He will fight for local jobs and opportunities.
Gordon believes in investing in the police to create safer communities.
One of his priorities is to improve local transport and broadband.
He has a record of taking action to protect our environment and green spaces.

issues.economy: Gordon understands the importance of a strong local economy.
issues.environment: He has a record of taking action to protect our environment and green spaces.

housing.content: He will fight for more local affordable housing and help those wanting to buy their own home.

leaflet.personalStatement: Gordon loves living in Edinburgh Pentlands and has been a strong local voice in the Scottish Parliament since 2016.

politicalExperience.achievements: Been a strong local voice in the Scottish Parliament.
